body_html:
@salexspb Thanks for your clarification. It's nice to hear that Caffe2 is going to support GPU Predictor
and thread-safe prediction very soon. As for my side, we won't be blocked for now, since my Predictor pool implementation is working. It's perfectly OK if this pull request won't finally get merged, I just want to share my work with the open-source community in case anyone needs it, but I also respect and will migrate to the official implementation after that ships.

body:
@salexspb Thanks for your clarification. It's nice to hear that Caffe2 is going to support GPU Predictor 
 and thread-safe prediction very soon. As for my side, we won't be blocked for now, since my Predictor pool implementation is working. It's perfectly OK if this pull request won't finally get merged, I just want to share my work with the open-source community in case anyone needs it, but I also respect and will migrate to the official implementation after that ships.
